annotations.description: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation is one of my favorite Christmas Movies and today I'm making Clark Griswold's Egg Nog. It's good, it's good, it's good g...
annotations.title: Eggnog National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation | How to Drink

textContent:
4 Egg Whites
1 Tbs. -or- 12.5 G Sugar
Beat to Still Peaks
Set Aside

4 egg yolks
.25 c -or- 50 g sugar
2 c -or- 475 ml. whole milk
1 c -or- 237 ml. heavy cream
2 oz. -or- 60 ml Bourbon (to taste, pour heavy)
2 oz. -or- 60 ml Rum (to taste, pour heavy)
Pinch of Salt
Nutmeg to taste
Mix Thoroughly
Fold in Egg Whites

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_kQiC0etS3g
title: Eggnog
